duties_responsibilities.duty: Wash and detail tractor and trailing equipment to company standards.
Assist with maintenance of labeling and inventory of supplies.
Transport materials, equipment, or supplies to or from work areas utilizing carts.
Sweep, shovel, or vacuum loose debris or salvageable scrap into containers and remove containers from work areas.
Follow company regulations for standard practice of sanitization of vehicles, both in and outside of the cab.
Perform safety checks on vehicles to ensure they meet Company standards including lock out keys and shop/chock blocks.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED equivalent; and the ability to work outdoors, in the elements, or across multiple shifts including nights and/or weekends if needed.
